actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish Federal insurance for medical malpractice claims made against hospitals with 100 beds or fewer.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to establish and carry out a medical malpractice insurance program which will enable qualified hospitals with one hundred beds or fewer to purchase insurance against the portion of losses arising from medical malpractice claims which exceed $1,000,000. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the medical malpractice insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to establish Federal insurance for medical malpractice claims made against hospitals with 100 beds or fewer.
